analysis.description:
KYRIOSToken (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#35-180) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#143-144)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol:
	Contract KYRIOSToken has payable functions:
	 - getAirDropTokens (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#90-109)
	 - getInspireTokens (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#109-127)
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#127-129)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

KYRIOSToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#39)
KYRIOSToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#36-37)
KYRIOSToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#38-39)
tokenRecipient.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#31-35) should be declared external
KYRIOSToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#143-144) should be declared external
KYRIOSToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#144-152) should be declared external
KYRIOSToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#156-166) should be declared external
KYRIOSToken.burn (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#166-173) should be declared external
KYRIOSToken.burnFrom (/unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol#173-180) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/35/0xd534b8e484366832c624f05ce4355e3261b6b61b.sol:
